BodyName: Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Juvenile Justice

Items.Title: Oversight - Examining the Treatment of Adolescents in New York City Jails and Reviewing the United States Department of Justices's Report on Violence at Rikers Island.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Examining the Treatment of Adolescents in New York City Jails and Reviewing the United States Department of Justices's Report on Violence at Rikers Island.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Juvenile Justice
Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.3668-A, which would raise the age of adult criminal responsibility from sixteen to eighteen years of age.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Raise the age of adult criminal responsibility from sixteen to eighteen years of age. (A.3668-A)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Speaker Mark-Viverito, Dromm, Vacca, Arroyo, Levin and Rodriguez

Items.Title: Oversight - Examining the Treatment of Adolescents in New York City Jails and Reviewing the United States Department of Justices's Report on Violence at Rikers Island.
